Property.Value: getdate()

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: getdate()

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: getdate()

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: getdate()

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
Insert into Relationship (DomId,SubID) select Id,@SubId from Users where [Screen Name]=@DomName
Delete i from Invites i join Users u on i.DomId=u.Id where [Screen Name]=@DomName and i.SubId=@SubId

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
declare @grouref int
select @grouref=RefId from Groups where GroupName=@group
if(select count(*) from [dbo].[UsersGroups] where [UserId]=@user and [GroupRefId]=@grouref)=0 BEGIN insert into [dbo].[UsersGroups] (UserId, GroupRefId) select @user, @grouref
END ELSE BEGIN
delete from [dbo].[UsersGroups] where UserId=@User and GroupRefId=@grouref END END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: Insert into Invites (SubId, DomId) Select u.Id, @DomId From Users u where [Screen Name]=@SubName RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN Select isnull(u.[screen name],'Anon') Sender, isnull(su.[screen name],'Anon') SubId, c.GroupRefId , convert(varchar(max),'') as Decrypt , c.Content from dbo.CmdLog c left join users u on c.senderid=u.id left join users su on c.SubId=su.id order by c.Id END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[USP_AdminCommandLog] AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT top 5 [Screen Name], [ThumbsUp] from users order by ThumbsUp desc RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value:
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[usp_bestsender]
AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN insert into Block (BlockerId, BlockeeId) select @blocker, @blockee END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: select * from Users where [Screen Name]=@username or [Login Name]=@email

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: select case when vr.SubID IS NULL then u.Varified else -1 end as Varified from Users u left join VarificationReq vr on vr.SubID=u.Id where u.ID = @ID RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN delete from ControlAppCmd where id =( SELECT top 1 id from [ControlAppCmd] c join CommandList cl on c.CmdId=cl.CmdId where SubId=@userID ORDER BY SendDate) END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: Delete i from Invites i join Users u on i.DomId=u.Id where [Screen Name]=@DomName and i.SubId=@SubId

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
DELETE cmd FROM ControlAppCmd cmd WHERE SubId=@userID
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
DELETE cmd FROM ControlAppCmd cmd WHERE SenderId in (Select BlockeeId FROM Block where BlockerId=@userID) AND SubId=@userID
DECLARE @Anon bit = 0 SELECT @Anon=AnonCmd from Users where ID=@userID
IF (@Anon=0) BEGIN DELETE cmd FROM ControlAppCmd cmd WHERE SenderId =-1 AND SubId=@userID END
SELECT cac.Id CacId, convert(varchar(100),SenderId) SenderId, cl.Content, case when r.Id is null then 'N' else 'D' end IsDom from ControlAppCmd cac join CommandList cl on cac.CmdId=cl.CmdId left join Relationship r on r.DomID=SenderId and r.SubID=@userID where cac.SubId=@userID ORDER BY SendDate
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
DELETE cmd FROM ControlAppCmd cmd WHERE SenderId in (Select BlockeeId FROM Block where BlockerId=@userID) AND SubId=@userID
DECLARE @Anon bit = 0 SELECT @Anon=AnonCmd from Users where ID=@userID
IF (@Anon=0) BEGIN DELETE cmd FROM ControlAppCmd cmd WHERE SenderId =-1 AND SubId=@userID END
SELECT TOP 1 convert(varchar(100),SenderId), cl.Content, case when r.Id is null then 'N' else 'D' end IsDom from ControlAppCmd cac join CommandList cl on cac.CmdId=cl.CmdId left join Relationship r on r.DomID=SenderId and r.SubID=@userID where cac.SubId=@userID ORDER BY SendDate
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
declare @newother int if @OtherUser!='' BEGIN select @newother=ID FROM Users where [Screen Name]= @OtherUser END ELSE BEGIN SET @newother=@OtherID END
select * from ( SELECT 'S' Type,ChatTxt,Date_Add FROM ChatLog where SenderID=@RequestID and ReceiverID=@newother
union
SELECT 'R' Type,ChatTxt,Date_Add FROM ChatLog where ReceiverID=@RequestID and SenderID=@newother ) as sub Order by Date_Add END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT [Screen Name] UserName, DomID from Relationship r join Users u on r.DomID=u.Id where SubID=@SubID

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: select GroupName,case when u.Id is null then 'False' else 'True' end as Allowed from [dbo].[Groups] g left join [dbo].[UsersGroups] ug on g.[RefId]=ug.[GroupRefId] left join [dbo].[Users] u on ug.[UserId]=u.Id and u.Id=@user

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT u.[Screen Name] DomUser from Invites i join Users u on i.DomId=u.Id where SubId=@SubId

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT STUFF( ( select ',['+DomUser+']' AS [text()] from ( SELECT u.[Screen Name] DomUser from Invites i join Users u on i.DomId=u.Id where SubId=@SubId ) as sub FOR XML PATH (''), TYPE ).value('text()[1]','nvarchar(max)'), 1, 1, '')

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
DELETE cmd FROM ControlAppCmd cmd WHERE SenderId in (Select BlockeeId FROM Block where BlockerId=@userID) AND SubId=@userID
DECLARE @Anon bit = 0 DECLARE @vari bit=0 DECLARE @Thumbs int=0 SELECT @Anon=AnonCmd, @vari=Varified , @Thumbs=ThumbsUp from Users where ID=@userID
IF (@Anon=0) BEGIN DELETE cmd FROM ControlAppCmd cmd WHERE SenderId =-1 AND SubId=@userID END
declare @whonext varchar(20)
select top 1 @whonext= isnull(GroupRefId,SenderId) from [ControlAppCmd] c join CommandList cl on c.CmdId=cl.CmdId where SubId=@userID order by [SendDate]
update Users set LoginDate=getdate() where ID=@userID
if Convert(int,@whonext )<-1 begin select @whonext= 'Group: '+ GroupName from Groups where RefId=@whonext end else begin if Convert(int,@whonext )=-1 begin set @whonext='Anon' end else begin set @whonext='' select @whonext=u.[Screen Name] from users u join Relationship r on u.Id=r.DomID where r.SubID=@userID if(@whonext='') set @whonext='User' end end SELECT convert(varchar(100),count(*)) counting, @whonext whonext, @vari varified, @Thumbs Thumbs from ControlAppCmd where SubId=@userID END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT STUFF( ( select ',['+UserName+']' AS [text()] from ( SELECT [Screen Name] UserName from Relationship r join Users u on r.SubID=u.Id where SubID=@MyID union SELECT [Screen Name] UserName from Relationship r join Users u on r.DomID=u.Id where SubID=@MyID ) as sub FOR XML PATH (''), TYPE ).value('text()[1]','nvarchar(max)'), 1, 1, '')

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT [Screen Name] UserName, SubID from Relationship r join Users u on r.SubID=u.Id where DomID=@DomID

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT * from Users where Id=@userid RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT u.[Screen Name] [User],u.[Login Name] Email,'Email' Code, vr.Count Tried FROM Users u JOIN VarificationReq vr on u.Id=vr.SubID where vr.Sent=0;

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value:
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Usp_GetVerificationReq]
AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SELECT Id, [Role],Varified from Users where [Screen Name]=@UserName and Password=@Password END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: insert into Users ([Screen Name], [Login Name], [Password],[Role], [RandOpt]) select @ScreenName, @Email, @Password, @Role, @opt

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN exec USP_BlockUser @reporter, @reportee
insert into Report ( ReporterId, Reportee, ReportedCommand ) select @reporter, @reportee, @content END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
declare @counting int
select @counting=count(*) from VarificationReq where SubID=@ID if @counting=0 BEGIN insert into VarificationReq ([SubID]) values (@ID) END select [Login Name],VarifiedCode from Users where ID = @ID
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
declare @newidins int Declare @senderid int =0 Declare @cmdid int =0 if (@username is not null) BEGIN if (@username!='') BEGIN select @senderid= ( select top 1 Id from ( SELECT Id, [Role] from Users where [Login Name]=@UserName and Password=@Password union SELECT Id, [Role] from Users where [Screen Name]=@UserName and Password=@Password ) as subq ) END ELSE BEGIN SET @senderid=-1 END END IF (@senderid!=0) BEGIN declare @id int IF (@usernm='') BEGIN
declare @numbers int SELECT @numbers=count(*) from Users where [RandOpt]=1
declare @which int select @which =cast(floor(rand()*@numbers) as int)+1
SELECT @id=Id FROM Users ORDER BY Id OFFSET @which-1 ROWS FETCH NEXT 1 ROWS ONLY;
insert into CommandList ([Content]) values (@usercmd)
select @newidins=SCOPE_IDENTITY()
insert into ControlAppCmd ([SenderId], [SubId], [CmdId] ) values (@senderid,@id,@newidins)
insert into CmdLog ([SenderId],[SubId], [Content]) values (@senderid,@id,@usercmd)
END ELSE IF ((ISNUMERIC(@usernm)=1) and (CONVERT(int,@usernm)<-1)) BEGIN
insert into CommandList ([Content]) values (@usercmd)
select @newidins=SCOPE_IDENTITY()
insert into ControlAppCmd ([SenderId], [SubId], [CmdId], [GroupRefId]) select @senderid,UserId, @newidins,CONVERT(int,@usernm) from UsersGroups where GroupRefId=CONVERT(int,@usernm) and UserId!=@senderid
insert into CmdLog ([SenderId],[SubId], [Content], [GroupRefId]) values (@senderid,@senderid,@usercmd,CONVERT(int,@usernm)) END ELSE BEGIN
select @id=( select top 1 Id from ( Select Id from Users where [Screen Name]=@usernm union Select Id from Users where convert(varchar(250),Id)=@usernm) sub1 ) if(@id is not null) BEGIN
insert into CommandList ([Content]) values (@usercmd)
select @newidins=SCOPE_IDENTITY()
insert into ControlAppCmd ([SenderId],[SubId], [CmdId]) values (@senderid,@id,@newidins)
insert into CmdLog ([SenderId],[SubId], [Content]) values (@senderid,@id,@usercmd) END END END
delete c from [ControlAppCmd] c join CommandList cl on c.CmdId=cl.CmdId where [SenderId]<0 and [Content] like '%1mp7JCqszmk=|||%'
delete c from [ControlAppCmd] c join CommandList cl on c.CmdId=cl.CmdId where [SenderId]<0 and [Content] like ''
delete c from CommandList c where CmdId not in (select CmdId from [ControlAppCmd])
END

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: null

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: null

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: null

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
declare @newother int if @RecUserName!='' BEGIN select @newother=ID FROM Users where [Screen Name]= @RecUserName END ELSE BEGIN SET @newother=@ReceiverId END
Insert into ChatLog (ReceiverID , SenderID , ChatTxt) values (@newother, @SenderId, @message)

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
if(select count(*) from dbo.users where id=@senderid)>0 BEGIN if @id!=@senderid BEGIN update users set ThumbsUp=ThumbsUp+1 where id=@senderid END
END RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
begin
delete from CommandList where senddate<dateadd(day,-5,getdate()) delete from [ControlAppCmd] where subid in ( select subid from [ControlAppCmd] cac left join CommandList cl on cac.CmdId=cl.CmdId where cl.CmdId is null
)
delete from CommandList where CmdId in ( select cac.CmdId from CommandList cac left join [ControlAppCmd] cl on cac.CmdId=cl.CmdId where cl.CmdId is null
)
delete from VarificationReq where VerifyDate<dateadd(day,-5,getdate())
delete from usersgroups where grouprefid=-11 and userid <>1
end

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE proc usp_tidyup as

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
declare @oldemail varchar(max) declare @curvar bit select @oldemail=[Login Name],@curvar=Varified from Users where ID=@ID
if @oldemail!=@email BEGIN set @curvar=0 update Users set VarifiedCode=rand()*1000 where ID=@ID END
update Users set RandOpt=@optin,Varified=@curvar, Password=@password, AnonCmd=@Anon, [Login Name]=case when @email is null then [Login Name] else @email end where ID=@ID

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: null

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN if @username!='' begin select * from users where [Screen Name]=@username END ELSE if @id!=0 BEGIN select * from users where id=@id END END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
declare @tries int select @tries=Count from VarificationReq where SubID=@ID
if @tries<=10 BEGIN update VarificationReq set VarificationCode=@varcode where SubID=@ID
declare @counting int select @counting=count(*) from Users u join VarificationReq vr on u.Id=vr.SubID and u.VarifiedCode=vr.VarificationCode
if @counting=1 BEGIN delete from VarificationReq where SubID=@ID update Users set Varified=1 where Id=@ID select 'Done' END else BEGIN UPDATE VarificationReq SET Count=Count+1 where SubID=@ID select 'Incorrect' END END ELSE BEGIN select 'Too many tried' END END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: update vr set vr.Sent=1 FROM VarificationReq vr JOIN Users u on u.Id=vr.SubID where u.[Screen Name]=@Username

Property.Name: HeaderContents
QueryScript
Property.Value: select c.SenderId, c.SubId, c.GroupRefId, cl.Content from [ControlAppCmd] c join CommandList cl on c.CmdId=cl.CmdId

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE VIEW [dbo].[Vw_ControlAppCmd] AS
